Hello,

My name is Dan Maharry. I am the articles editor at developerfusion=
.com. A member of this group has written me the first of a two part article=
 entitled "Evaluating REST Frameworks Part 1: A Maturity Model" and I am lo=
oking for one or two people to be kind enough to give it a once-over techni=
cal review for correctness. 

If any of you could spare some time to review=
 this article and perhaps also the second part once it is written, please g=
et in touch either through this thread or direct to my email, dan AT develo=
perfusion DOT co DOT uk.

Much appreciated,

Dan Maharry
Editor, DeveloperF=
usion.
